title: Auxiliary Digital Token
description: Non-native digital token created as an application on an existing blockchain or other distributed ledger technology for its issuance, storage, or transaction record
copyright: Copyright © 2021 Digital Token Identifier Foundation Limited 2021. All Rights Reserved.

DTIType.title: Digital Token Identifier Type
DTIType.description: Category of the digital token identifier

enum_titles: Distributed Ledger without a Native Digital Token
Functionally Fungible Group of Digital Tokens

templateVersion.title: Template Version
templateVersion.description: The template version (i.e. JSON schema document) for which this record is valid

LongName.condition: Conditionally required for non provisional records
LongName.title: Digital Token Long Name
LongName.description: Digital token long name is a string containing the full name of the digital token

OrigLangLongName.title: Original Language Digital Token Long Name

ShortName.title: Digital Token Digital Token Short Name
ShortName.description: Short name or ticker symbol of the digital token

OrigLangShortName.title: Original Language Digital Token Short Name

UnderlyingAssetExternalIdentifierType.title: Underlying Asset External Identifier Type
UnderlyingAssetExternalIdentifierType.description: Underlying asset external identifier type for the digital token

enum_elaboration.SEDOL: Stock Exchange Daily Official List assigned by the London Stock Exchange
enum_elaboration.FIGI: An Object Management Group (OMG) standard; Formerly known as "Bloomberg Open Symbology BBGID"

UnderlyingAssetExternalIdentifierValue.title: Underlying Asset External Identifier Value
UnderlyingAssetExternalIdentifierValue.description: Underlying asset external identifier value for the digital token

DTIExternalIdentifierType.title: Digital Token External Identifier Type
DTIExternalIdentifierType.description: External identifier type for the digital token

ExternalIdentifierValue.title: Digital Token External Identifier Value
ExternalIdentifierValue.description: External identifier for the digital token

UnitMultiplier.condition: Conditionally required for non provisional records
UnitMultiplier.title: Digital Token Unit Multiplier
UnitMultiplier.description: Multiplier used to map from the unit of value stored on the distributed ledger to the unit of value associated with the digital token long name

AuxiliaryMechanism.condition: Conditionally required for non provisional records
AuxiliaryMechanism.title: Auxiliary Digital Token Mechanism

enum_elaboration.ATS: Aptos identifies a token by its TokenId that includes TokenDataId and property_version.
enum_elaboration.ASA: The Algorand protocol supports the creation of on-chain assets that benefit from the same security, compatibility, speed and ease of use as the Algo. The official name for assets on Algorand is Algorand Standard Assets (ASA).
enum_elaboration.BEP-2: BEP-2 is a technical standard for the issuance and implementation of tokens on the Binance Chain
enum_elaboration.BEP-20: BEP-20 is a technical standard for the issuance and implementation of tokens on the Binance Chain
enum_elaboration.Cardano Smart Contract: Cardano smart contracts are digital agreements defined in code that automate and enforce the terms of a contract without the need for intermediaries, enabling secure and transparent transactions on Cardano blockchain.
enum_elaboration.CRC20: Cronos Token Standard that implements an API for tokens within Smart Contracts
enum_elaboration.CW20: CW20 is a specification for fungible tokens based on CosmWasm
enum_elaboration.ERC-20: Ethereum Token Standard that implements an API for tokens within Smart Contracts.
enum_elaboration.EOSIO.TOKEN: Smart Contract standard implementation on EOSIO blockchain
enum_elaboration.FA2: FA2 is a token standard on Tezos
enum_elaboration.FT: The FT is a specification for creating and managing fungible tokens on Flow blockchain, which are tokens with equal value and interchangeable.
enum_elaboration.Fungible CashToken: A token is an asset – distinct from the Bitcoin Cash currency – that can be created and transferred on the Bitcoin Cash network.
enum_elaboration.GSDAP: Digital token mechanism on GS DAP ledger
enum_elaboration.HRC20: HRC-20 are fungible tokens minted on the Harmony network, much like ERC-20 tokens are on Ethereum.
enum_elaboration.HRC-20: Heco blockchain protocol, fully compatible with ERC20 standard.
enum_elaboration.HTS: A token service on the Hedera ledger. This service defines a common implementation for Fungible and Non Fungible tokens.
enum_elaboration.IBC Coin: The Inter-Blockchain Communication Protocol (IBC) is a protocol to handle authentication and transport of data between two blockchains on Cosmos ecosystem.
enum_elaboration.Jetton: A Jetton is a smart contract implementing a fungible token
enum_elaboration.KIP-7: A fungible token standard for Klaytn.
enum_elaboration.LiquidAsset: Liquid assets are tokens issued on the Liquid Network
enum_elaboration.Native Attribute: A DTI reference to the definition of the variable defining the token. Native Data Structures are used to distinguish co-native tokens
enum_elaboration.Native Coin: A native coin used in the Cosmos ecosystem.
enum_elaboration.NEP-5: The NEP-5 standard is a token standard which represents a tokenized smart contract.
enum_elaboration.NEP-141: A standard interface for fungible tokens that allows for a normal transfer as well as a transfer and method call in a single transaction on NEAR Protocol.
enum_elaboration.OMNI: Omni is a platform for creating and trading custom digital assets and currencies.
enum_elaboration.SEP-1: Stellar Ecosystem Proposals are open protocols for building on top of Stellar, and the very first SEP, aptly named SEP-1, specifies everything you could ever want to include in a stellar.toml file
enum_elaboration.SEP20: This SEP proposes an interface standard to create token contracts on smartBCH
enum_elaboration.SPL-Token: A Token program on the Solana blockchain. This program defines a common implementation for Fungible and Non Fungible tokens
enum_elaboration.StatemineAsset: Asset issued on Statemine, a parachain of Kusama
enum_elaboration.StatemintAsset: Asset issued on Statemint, a parachain of Polkadot
enum_elaboration.TRC-10: TRC-10 tokens are issued by system contract. TRC-10 is a technical token standard supported by the TRON blockchain natively without the TRON Virtual Machine (TVM)
enum_elaboration.TRC-20: TRC-20 is a technical standard used for smart contracts on the TRON blockchain for implementing tokens with the TRON Virtual Machine (TVM).
enum_elaboration.SDX: Digital token mechanism on SDX R3 Corda Ledger
enum_elaboration.SLP Token: Simple Ledger Protocol is a token system for the Bitcoin Cash network. It allows users to create, issue, and transfer digital tokens that enjoy the same security model and network of Bitcoin Cash.
enum_elaboration.WSC: Smart contracts on the Waves blockchain are accounts and assets with assigned scripts written in Ride.

AuxiliaryDistributedLedger.condition: Conditionally required for non provisional records
AuxiliaryDistributedLedger.title: Auxiliary Digital Token Distributed Ledger
AuxiliaryDistributedLedger.description: A DTI of a native digital token [DTIType=1] or of a distributed ledger without a distributed ledger [DTIType=2]. The distributed ledger of the DTI is used as the platform for the auxiliary digital token

AuxiliaryTechnicalReference.condition: Conditionally required for non provisional records
AuxiliaryTechnicalReference.title: Auxiliary Digital Token Technical Reference
AuxiliaryTechnicalReference.description: Element, such as a smart contract address, used to uniquely identify an auxiliary digital token’s origin on a distributed ledger technology platform

recVersion.title: Record Version
recVersion.description: The version of the record, incremental integer starting at 1 and incrementing each time the record is updated (e.g. with a new fork)

recDateTime.title: Record Date Time
recDateTime.description: The time at which this record version has been created

Provisional.title: Provisional Digital Token Identifier
Provisional.description: If true, the record contains normative or informative data elements in a provisional request for a DTI when one or more data elements (which may include mandatory data elements) are not yet available

Private.title: Private Digital Token
Private.description: If true, the record contains normative or informative data elements that are verified according to the DTIF guidelines but may not be independently verifiable by the general public

Disputed.title: Disputed Digital Token Identifier
Disputed.description: If true, the record contains normative or informative data elements that are disputed by one or more DTIF users

Deleted.title: Deleted Digital Token Identifier
Deleted.description: Record is marked Deleted due to technical reason(s) (e.g. invalid or duplicate token) or due to business reason(s) (e.g. a provisional token becomes invalid). Users are advised not to use this token.
